name: Easy Javascript Framework (EJF)
short_description:
Easy Javascript Framework (EJF) is a very simple framework to help people to develop applications using Javascript.
There are a lot of javascript framework nonetheless our objective is to provide a documentation of each javascript function like javadoc.
